ovdesc.p: This screen is used to store the non-working days of a country at region level.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.COUNTRYNONWORKINGDAY
This table stores the exceptions. If a date is not a holiday, it will not be stored in this table.

desc.p: Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates a Region,State etc. within a Country.

Up to 35 Alphanumeric characters allowed. Defaults to "ALL" if left blank. When set to "ALL" , it implies that the setup is for all regions within the mentioned Countrycode. It is usually used to define a country level holiday. If not "ALL", the value linkes to field 'Region' in PPT.REGION.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates if the entered date is a weekend holiday or not. ie Saturday or Sunday in Western countries.
Y - Yes.The entered date is a weekend holiday.
N - No.The entered date is not a weekend holiday.
Blank - The entered date is not a weekend holiday.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies a valid country code for which holiday is defined.
Mandatory field. Allows 2 alphanumeric characters. Values links to field COUNTRY.CODE in COUNTRY.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Specifies the actual holiday date for the respective country and region.
1) Mandatory field. Any valid date can be selected by clicking on the Calendar. Allows 11 characters in Date format.
Indicates if the entered Date is a non-weekend holiday or not.
Y - Indicates the entered Date is a non-weekend(true) holiday.
N - Indicates the entered Date is a not a non-weekend(true) holiday.
Non Mandatory field. Defaults to 'Y' if left blank.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
